casebody.data:
HUGO VAN DOVER ESTATES, INCORPORATED, RELATOR, v. JERSEY CITY ET AL., RESPONDENTS. Submitted October term, 1928 Decided January 3, 1929.

Before Justices Mintuen, Black and Campbell.

Eor the relator, Aaron Gordon. Eor the respondents, Frank J. Reardon. Peb Cubiam.

The application for the writ of mandamus is denied and the rule to show cause is discharged.
